channel.title: Need help with my client
channel.description: I got my server up and running, how do i give it to other people? i tried copying and putting the client in a new folder and it didnt work:/ can anybody help me please

item.title: Need help with my client
item.dc:creator: @Wenis_Tree Wenis Tree
item.description:
@Wenis_Tree wrote:

Jar your client, upload it somewere then give them the download link, make sure you change your client ip to your ip before you send it to them

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with my client
item.dc:creator: @AssassinsCRB AssassinsCRB
item.description:
@AssassinsCRB wrote:

You need to change the ip to your No-Ip or Hamachi server (your friends have to join the hamachi too), (you only use 127.0.0.1) then you can compress it into a winrar file and upload it to a site and send the link to your friends to download or send the .rar file through skype to them.

Read full topic
